subject: Pro X ultra control box
description_text:
I just received my pro X ultra control box and haptic vram motors got everything setup per instructions. I then opened the software manager and it shows a warning that the unit is in upgrade mode. I have tried toggling the switch and reconnecting the usb it still doesn’t work. Any help or suggestions would be greatly appreciated. 
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Thor,  There is an upgrade button on the control box. Pop it up and then reinsert the USB cable; this will allow the device to enter normal mode.

I tried that it does not work still shows upgrade mode. 
Sent from my iPhone

>

So is there any other suggestions to get the Prix ultra control to work or should we start and exchange for a new one?
Sent from my iPhone

>

Hi Thor,     Please open SIMSONN Manager 2.0.9 and navigate to: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → Pedals, then select the proxultra.sfu firmware file I sent you. Once the update is complete, click the Restore button to return to normal operation.

Thank you that worked, the haptics are an amazing upgrade on my sim racing rig will make sure to spread the good word of your support and product.
Sent from my iPhone

>
